document_data.name: ''Robe of the Watcher''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''robe of the Watcher''''' was a set of [[enchanted]] [[robe]]s that originated from the [[drow]] city of [[Rilauven]].
document_data.Description: These robes were bestowed upon whichever mage from Rilauven that demonstrated the greatest command over [[divination]] magic within the city's sorcerous academy.
document_data.Powers: The ''robe of the Watcher'' bolstered the wearer's physical defenses, their inherent [[magic]]al resistance, and protected against [[spell]]s cast against them. They also rendered the wearer ''[[nondetection|nondetectible]]'' by magical means, and shielded them from the stupefying gaze of [[umber hulk]]s.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Malavon Despana]], [[archmage]] of [[Rilauven]] and patron of [[House Despana]].
